title: The Bright Side: Elusive wild cat rediscovered in Thailand after three decades, conservationists say
summary: An elusive wild cat long feared extinct in Thailand has been rediscovered three decades after the last recorded sighting, conservation authorities said. Camera traps in southern Thailand’s Princess Sirindhorn Wildlife Sanctuary captured 29 detections, including a female with her cub, offering rare hope for the endangered flat-headed cat, a species confined…
